mapper.insert: INSERT INTO beans (roastery_id, country, farm, variety, processing_method, roasting_level, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{roasteryId}, #{country}, #{farm}, #{variety}, #{processingMethod}, #{roastingLevel}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE beans SET country = #{country}, farm = #{farm}, variety = #{variety}, processing_method = #{processingMethod}, roasting_level = #{roastingLevel}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE beans SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
